Constructor Detail

Grid

public Grid(int yNum,
            int xNum,
            int layerCount)
This constructor initializes and instantiates all of the cell objects from the various config files.

Parameters:
maxXNum - is the amount of rows in the grid taken from a config file.
colNum - is the amount of columns in the grid taken from a config file.
layerCount - is the amount of layers in the grid, which controls how many times the for loop iterates in initialize.

Grid

public Grid()
For creating a grid without initializing. USED in ParseSimulationXML.java.

Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize(int yNum,
                       int xNum,
                       int layerCount)
Initialize creates all of the cells at every single layer which makes up our entire grid.

Parameters:
rowNum - is the amount of rows in the grid taken from the config file.
colNum - is the amount of columns in the grid taken from the config file.
layerCount - is the amount of layers in the grid, which controls how many times the for loop iterates.

importCSV

public void importCSV(java.lang.String fileName,
                      int level,
                      int type)
Imports a CSV file that has a particular type on a certain layer "level".

Parameters:
fileName - name of the file we are importing.
level - is the integer representing the layer we are on.
type - is either OIL, GAS,

addRock

public void addRock(java.lang.String rocktype,
                    int layer)
Parameters:
rocktype - is the type of rock.
layer - is the layer at which that rock type is found.

parseCSV

private void parseCSV(au.com.bytecode.opencsv.CSVReader reader,
                      int type,
                      int level)
Parameters:
reader - is the current file that the information is being read from
type - is the type of layer that is being imported
level - is the current level number that we are on

addCell

public void addCell(int x,
                    int y,
                    int[] layers,
                    int gas,
                    int oil)
This method is what is actually putting the data into the cells

Parameters:
x - is the cell's row location
y - is the cell's col location
layers - is the total amount of layers.
gas - contains the rate at which the gas gives teh moniez. Is 0 if no gas is contained in the cell.
oil - contains the rate at which the oil gives teh moniez. Is 0 if no oil is contained in the cell.

getGas

public int getGas(int x,
                  int y,
                  int depth)
This method gets the rate of the gas

Parameters:
x - is the cell's row location
y - is the cell's col location
Returns:
The rate of the gassy flow at the x, y location.

setOwner

public void setOwner(Operator owner,
                     int x,
                     int y)
This method sets the owner of a particular cell on the grid.

Parameters:
owner - is an Operator that holds the name of the team that won this cell in Auction.
x - is the cell's row location
y - is the cell's col location

                       int y)

public int getOil(int x,
                  int y,
                  int depth)
This method gets the rate of the oil.

Parameters:
x - is the cell's row location
y - is the cell's col location
Returns:
The rate of the oil flow at the x, y location.

getLayer

int getLayer(int x,
             int y,
             int depth)
This method gets a particular layer's information.

Parameters:
x - is the cell's row location
y - is the cell's col location
depth - is the layer's depth (ft. above sea level?)*
Returns:
The x, y location as well as the depth of the layer.

Parameters:

setGridSize

public static void setGridSize(int size)
Parameters:
size - is the Grid size in feet. E.G. 1320(5280/4) represents a 4x4 discritinization of a square mile
